attributes.action: change the National Anthem for England to Jerusalem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jarusalem (words from the poem "And Did Those Feet In Ancient Times" by William Blake), is stated to be the most popular patrotic song in England, sources are from polls created on the Internet, from Wikipedia, The Times, The Telegraph and Private Eye. It is a beautiful hymn with powerful words, surely this is worth a thought? A tribute to the generations that have gone before us to preserve that 'green and pleasant land'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
